revision.revremark: Tidied up Introduction chapter; completed UML tutorial chapter apart from the case study description; added GNU Free Documentation Licence as an appendix; added reference chapter on predefined datatypes; classes, interfaces and stereotypes; reorganised diagrams into images/tutorial and images/reference sections and substituted "To Be Provided" diagram where no suitable one is available.
Update by Jeremy Bennett preparing to support release of &argouml; 0.9.6. Incorporates material from previous manuals, attempts to provide a skeleton structure for the whole document.
Version due to Philippe Vanpeperstraete. History of previous versions unknown.
